New Orleans Feb. 24th /83
Dr. Hugo Schuchardt
div.p:
I have your letter of January 29th only at the moment of departure from home, to be absent -at a great distance- for several weeks. I shall keep your letter before me, and will endeavor on reaching Baltimore to send you a scientific journal containing an article on the Creole Patois
Harrison (1882) . which will give you far more information than will be furnished in my books.

postscript.p: As Mr. Cable dictated this, with several other letters, very hurriedly just before leaving home, he did not sign it. Respectfully
